pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Honest MLThis library allows you to do honest-MLYou can see a talk about this library * [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AHQaQrii1vM&t=439s&ab_channel=DataScienceConnect)[![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/honest-ml/badge/?version=latest)](https://honest-ml.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)
